title: 'Easy on the fries!', Japan scientists tell hopeful bald people
text:
'Easy on the fries!', Japan scientists tell hopeful bald people 4:13pm GMT - 01:17 
Japanese scientists have a developed a way to stimulate hair growth in bald mice with the help of a chemical used by fast-food restaurants for cooking fried potatoes - but eating french fries won't stop hairlines receding, they say. Amy Pollock reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Japanese scientists have a developed a way to stimulate hair growth in bald mice with the help of a chemical used by fast-food restaurants for cooking fried potatoes - but eating french fries won't stop hairlines receding, they say.
